short_definition: The first day of the period of time prescribed by law during which a court holds session. The docket is set on this day for the session of not set at some other time(s).
long_definition_html: The first day of the period of time prescribed by law during which a court holds session. The docket is set on this day for the session of not set at some other time(s).
